item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g083300 Gene Symbol: GmFLS2a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmFLS2a and GmFLS2b are likely redundant.

item.title: GmMLRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G122000 Gene Symbol: GmMLRK1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A novel soybean malectin-like receptor kinase-encoding gene, GmMLRK1, provides resistance to soybean mosaic virus.

item.title: LrABCF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrABCF1 Gene Name: ATP-binding cassette transporter1 Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: LrABCF1, a GCN-type ATP-binding cassette transporter from Lilium regale, is involved in defense responses against viral and fungal pathogens.

item.title: NtGSNOR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtGSNOR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Description: our results indicate that NtGSNOR1 functions as both positive and negative regulator of cell death under different conditions and displays distinct effects on resistance against viral and bacterial pathogens.

item.title: Rsv4

item.title: TaTHI2-7A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7A02G376800.1 Gene Symbol: TaTHI2-7A Gene Name: thiamine thiazole synthase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaTHI2 interacts with Ca2+-dependent protein kinase TaCPK5 to suppress virus infection by regulating ROS accumulation.
